testCases.query: I am building a Next.js 16 app and need to create a product listing page that fetches data from my database, caches it with revalidation, and has an interactive filter sidebar
expectedBehavior: Claude uses Server Component for the product listing (async, direct DB access, no client JS)
Uses the 'use cache' directive with cacheLife and cacheTag for data caching instead of legacy fetch options
Extracts the interactive filter sidebar as a Client Component with 'use client' directive
Passes Server Components as children to Client Components where needed
Uses async params pattern (await params) per Next.js 16 requirements
Wraps async data in Suspense boundaries for streaming

testCases.query: I am migrating from Next.js 15 to 16 and getting errors about params being undefined and experimental_ppr not being a valid export
expectedBehavior: Claude references the nextjs-16-upgrade guide for breaking changes
Shows how to convert params from sync to async (add await before params)
Explains that experimental_ppr is removed and replaced by Cache Components with 'use cache' directive
Covers the cacheComponents: true config in next.config.ts
Mentions other breaking changes: async cookies/headers, middleware.ts to proxy.ts
